title: Forrest Gump 2: Gump Again
description: The long-awaited and surprisingly high-budget sequel to the Tom Hanks Oscar-winning film.
quote: I guess life is a lot like a crab cake. There’s lots of good stuff in the middle, but it’s surrounded by a bunch of crap.
altHero: Kevin Nealon as Forrest Gump sitting on a bench and talking to a woman
